summary: An email from an NYPD detective on the FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force forwarding attachments related to interviews or notes, indicating ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Detective NYPD
persons.role: NYPD Detective on FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: The sender of the email who is forwarding investigative attachments related to the case.

events.title: Email Forwarding Investigative Materials
events.description: An NYPD detective on the FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force sends an email with attachments including interview documents and notes.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 9, 2021, from an NYPD detective assigned to the FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The email's purpose is to forward several attachments, including files named 'interview_of -+Vol.pdf', 'notes+6.23.21042045.pdf', 'notes+3.23.21153113.pdf', and 'IMG_1838.jpg'.
The attachments suggest the transmission of interview records, investigative notes, and a photograph, indicating active case work.
The communication highlights interagency cooperation between the NYPD and the FBI on the Epstein investigation.
